data.name: Art Studio VR
data.description:
Art Studio VR is an intuitive painting tool created for aspiring artists and visionary professionals. Create striking sketches, full-on paintings, and beautiful textures on your own 3D models. 

** The app is in development and currently in early access, get it with a discount price **

Highlights!

• Achieve different looks with a variety of tools that range in size, finish, and pressure.
• Import and texturize your 3D models with natural painting tools.
• Lifelike intuitive painting experience with a twist for the pros.
• Save your art as a .PNG or a .JPG.

Note: Some of these features will arrive in later updates. Leave us a comment saying what other features you would like to see!

translations.long_description:
Art Studio VR es una herramienta de pintura intuitiva creada para artistas aspirantes y visionarios profesionales. Crea increíbles bocetos , sorprendentes pinturas y hermosas texturas en tus propios modelos 3D.

¡Aspectos destacados!

• Consigue diferentes resultados con nuestra variedad de herramientas que varían en tamaño, acabado y presión.
• Importa y texturiza tus modelos 3D con herramientas de pintura.
• Pinta de manera intuitiva y realista con un toque para los profesionales.
• Exporta tu arte como .PNG o .JPG.
